about_the_game:
The Void Invaders OST is here! The soundtrack features music by Kingdaro.

If you'd like to support Kingdaro, check out his SoundCloud and contact him there.

Tracks:
  • Menu: Electronized (3:36)
  • Level Mode - 1: Ionizer (3:22)
  • Level Mode - 2: Fusion Reactor (3:41)
  • Level Mode - 3: Midnight Run (4:06)
  • Level Mode - Boss: Substance (5:28)
  • Hardcore Mode: Quake (4:00)
  • Hardcore Mode - Boss: Volatile Substance (3:46)
  • Endless Mode: Cyclone (4:48)
  • Wave Mode: Never Coming Back (4:37)
  • Credits: Harmony Spectrum (5:10)
Total: 42:34
